main event: A UFO was observed over Selfridge AFB, Michigan on September 1, 1962.
interesting points: The object appeared to resemble a planet and was white in color., The object was observed for approximately five minutes., It moved in a definite direction, making a 45Â° turn to the northeast., The observation was made from approximately 5 miles away from Selfridge AFB., The weather was clear with visibility of about 10 miles.
sighted object: one white object resembling a planet
witness description: OCC Tool Engineer and a USMC Navigator
